text: Search this document: This document describes the Analysis Programming Language, APL, and contains descriptions of all the different APL commands that can be used. For information about Terms and Acryonyms used in this document, see the Terminology document. This section contains the following subsections: Language Characteristics General Functions Aggregation Functions APL Container Functions APL Collection Strategy Functions Avro Decoding/Encoding Functions Azure Functions Audit Functions Base64 Functions Backlog Size Functions Database Functions Decrypt Functions Diameter Functions Distributed Storage Functions DNS Lookup Function Dynamic Functions External References Functions File Functions FNTUDR Functions Hash and Checksum Functions HTTP Functions JSON Functions HTTP/2 Functions LDAP Functions Log and Notification Functions MIM Functions PKCS7 Functions Random Number Generation Functions Shell Script Execution Functions Signature Functions Workflow Functions
title: APL Reference Guide - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
